Package az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.service

Class BookServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.service.BookServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookService
@Service public class BookServiceImpl extends Object implements BookService
Service implementation for managing books. This service provides methods to perform CRUD operations on books,as well as searching for books based on various criteria.

    • findBooksByJoinResult

      public List<Book> findBooksByJoinResult(String title, String authorName, Integer publicationYear, String genre)
      Searches for books based on the provided criteria.
      Specified by:
      findBooksByJoinResult in interface BookService
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book (can be partial or full).
      authorName - The name of the author (can be partial or full).
      publicationYear - The publication year of the book.
      genre - The genre of the book (can be partial or full).
      Returns:
      A list of books matching the search criteria.
